title: Pivotal Application Services for Windows Workshop
content:
Pivotal Platform Architecture helps companies learn how to solve IT and engineering challenges. We encourage you to explore our workshops. Build the future with Pivotal!  Pivotal Application Services for Windows Workshop
  Workshop Conceitos Workshop Demos Introduction & Credentials Setup Environment Create .NET Microservice Push Microservice to PASW Explore Applications Manager Attach an autoscaler Add a new route Next Steps

title: Conceitos
content: Conceitos Aprenda o básico, entenda arquiteturas e preencha os principais conceitos por trás do workshop.

title: Demos
content: Demos Construa arquiteturas e teste os principais conceitos por trás do workshop.
